tag.title: Tag
tag.subtitle: Tag component for displaying labels, categories and statuses with support for various color palettes, styles and icons

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard tag with text. Text is set via `value` property or `default` slot

severity.title: Color Palettes
severity.description: Tag supports seven color palettes via `severity` property: `primary`, `secondary`, `contrast`, `success`, `error`, `warning`, `info`

outlined.title: Outlined Variant
outlined.description: Tag with outline instead of filled background. Set via `variant="outlined"` property

soft.title: Soft Variant
soft.description: Tag with soft background (semi-transparent). Set via `variant="soft"` property

size.title: Size
size.description: Tag size is controlled by `size` property. Available values: `sm` (small), `lg` (large). Default is medium size

closable.title: With Close Button
closable.description: Tag with close button. Activated via `closable` property. Clicking button triggers `close` event

rounded.title: Rounded Corners
rounded.description: Tag with rounded corners. Activated via `rounded` property

withIcon.title: With Icons
withIcon.description: Tag with icons before and after text. Icons are set via `prefixIcon` (before text) and `suffixIcon` (after text) properties. All icons must be Vue components

template.title: Custom Template
template.description: Using `prefix` and `suffix` slots for custom content before and after text. Slots have priority over corresponding icons (`prefixIcon` and `suffixIcon`)

argTypes.severity: Tag color palette: primary, secondary, contrast, success, error, warning, info
argTypes.variant: Tag style variant: filled (filled), outlined (with outline), soft (soft)
argTypes.closable: Show close button in tag (clicking which triggers close event)
argTypes.prefixIcon: Vue component icon displayed before tag text
argTypes.suffixIcon: Vue component icon displayed after tag text
argTypes.close: Event fired when close button is clicked
argTypes.prefix: Slot for custom content before tag text (has priority over prefixIcon)
argTypes.suffix: Slot for custom content after tag text (has priority over suffixIcon)
